message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  It's a fantastic deal for you, and it gives me a good price as well.  What do you say?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm trying to be a smart buyer here.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000, but that's my final offer.  It's still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,300,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,250,000
